foodmoji.command.showFoodmoji.title: Choose Foodmoji
foodmoji.command.addRandomFoodmoji.title: Choose random Foodmoji
foodmoji.config.addCustomEmoji: Add custom emoji other than Foodmoji
foodmoji.config.onlyUseCustomEmoji: Only use your custom emoji, not the ones in the Foodmoji
foodmoji.config.outputType: Configure the type of emoji output as needed
foodmoji.config.outputType.emoji: Suitable for GitHub, Gitlab, Coding, etc
foodmoji.config.showEmojiCode: Enable searching foodmojis by emoji code (example: ambulance will return hotfix)
foodmoji.config.asSuffix: Insertion of Foodmoji at the end of messages
